summary.span: 提供类型用于支持创建并使用运行时可访问的插件序列化程序（该程序用于读取和写入各种数据格式文档）。

span.span: Provides types that support the creation and use of run-time accessible plug-in serializers that read and write documents in different data formats.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插件序列化程序仅可用于完全信任应用程序。Plug-in serializers can only be used with full trust applications. 通过应用程序调用时，插件序列化程序将在应用程序在同一线程中运行，并且仅可访问在应用程序线程内创建的元素。When called by the application, the plug-in serializer runs in the same thread as the application and can only access elements created within the application thread. 在设计时自定义插件序列化程序，务必正确地处理所有可能的错误条件。When designing a custom plug-in serializer, it is important to properly handle all possible error conditions. 内部插件序列化程序故障可能会导致应用程序失败。A failure within a plug-in serializer can cause an application to fail.
